name: Atlantis is near
description:
You are a curious archaeologist free diving to find the mythical Atlantis island. 

Catch the air bubbles and dodge the obstacles to avoid a painful death. 

Will you ever find Atlantis ? Play the game and try to go always further, you know it's near!

This is our game jam attempt for ZenoJam#3 (theme  : "It never ends"). 

We sincerely hope that you will enjoy it and thank you a lot for playing it !

Credits :

Music : Deep Blue - bensound.com

Sounds : Freesounds.org

Font : De Valencia - Font Squirrel.com
